meanings.definition: Capable of being shaped or formed
meanings.sent1: The clay was moldable, allowing the artist to create various shapes.
meanings.sent2: The playdough is moldable, so children can make different figures.
meanings.sent3: The moldable cookie dough made it easy for the baker to create fun shapes.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was as moldable as clay, ready to absorb new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The flexible material was so moldable that it could be shaped with just a touch.

meanings.definition: Able to be molded or manipulated
meanings.sent1: The plasticine was moldable, allowing the sculptor to create intricate details.
meanings.sent2: The wax was moldable, making it easy to shape into different forms.
meanings.sent3: The moldable putty entertained the kids for hours as they shaped it into animals.
meanings.sent4: Her opinions were as moldable as clay, easily influenced by others.
meanings.sent5: The dough was so moldable that it could be twisted and turned into any shape.

meanings.sent1: The moldable schedule allowed for last-minute changes without any issues.
meanings.sent2: The plan was moldable, so it could be adjusted based on new information.
meanings.sent3: His mood was as moldable as playdough, shifting with each passing moment.
meanings.sent4: The team's strategy was as moldable as clay, ready to evolve as needed.
meanings.sent5: The moldable material could easily conform to different shapes and sizes.
